name: @realm/integration-tests
description: A wrapper module that can install and run Realm JS tests in various environments

scripts.postinstall: npm run realm/pack && npm run tests/install && npm run tests/pack && npm run environments/install
scripts.lint: npm run tests/lint && npm run environments/lint
scripts.realm/pack: npm run isWin -s && SET REALM_BUILD_ANDROID_PACKAGE=1 && npm run realm/pack-internal || REALM_BUILD_ANDROID_PACKAGE=1 && npm run realm/pack-internal
